recipe.title: Poisson Cru ("Tahitian Salad")
ingredients: 1 pound very fresh high-grade ahi tuna, diced in neat 1/2-inch cubes
1/2 cup diced peeled and seeded cucumber
4 to 5 scallions, green and white portions, split lengthwise and minced
1 fresh hot small green or red chile, seeded and minced, optional
3/4 teaspoon salt, or more to taste
1 medium tomato, seeded and squeezed to eliminate liquid, diced
instructions: Combine in a medium bowl the tuna, lime juice, coconut milk, cucumber, scallions, optional chile and coconut, salt, and pepper. Refrigerate 30 minutes to 1 hour. Mix in the tomato and serve right away.
